pages.text: A rune associated with shielding and repulsion.
$(l)In World$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Protects block from harm$(li)Self: Repels mobs [high tier: harms them too]$(li)Collision: Applies absorption
$(l)On Armor$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Gives absorption$(li)Self: Takes less damage$(li)Collision: Gives target absorption
$(l)On Tool$()$(br)$(li)Wield: Acts as shield$(li)Self: No extra damage from misusing tool$(li)Collision: Gives target absorption
